title: Add comprehensive telemetry logging to persona workflows
requester: As a developer using vscode-rhizome, I want detailed logs at each step of asking personas so that I can see exactly what's happening and debug issues easily.
workflow: 1. Add telemetry() helper function with [COMPONENT] PHASE: MESSAGE format
targets: 2. Add START/STEP/SUCCESS/RESULT logs to askPersona command

steps.title: Add telemetry() helper function with [COMPONENT] PHASE: MESSAGE format
Add START/STEP/SUCCESS logs to askPersona command (quick picker flow)
Add START/STEP/SUCCESS logs to documentWithPersona command (inline comments flow)
Add detailed step logs to getAvailablePersonas (JSON/text/fallback paths)
Add detailed step logs to queryPersona (init/execute/format/result)
Test both flows end-to-end with F5 debugger and verify logs
Document telemetry output: what each log means and when to check it
